text: The 2018 National Challenge Cup final was a football match between Pakistan Air Force and WAPDA played on 10 May 2018 at KPT Football Stadium in Karachi. Pakistan Air Force won their second National Challenge Cup title after having won the first in 2014. ==Road to final== {| style="width:100%;text- align:center" |- style="vertical-align:top;background:#9cf" !colspan=2 style="width:1*"| WAPDA !Round !colspan=2 style="width:1*"| Pakistan Air Force |- style="vertical-align:top;background:#c1e0ff" |Opponent |Result |Group stage |Opponent |Result |- |align=left| Sui Southern Gas |1–0 |style="background:#c1e0ff"|Matchday 1 |align=left| Pakistan Police |2–2 |- |align=left| Karachi United |3–0 |style="background:#c1e0ff"|Matchday 2 |align=left| State Life |2–0 |- |colspan="2" style="text- align:center;vertical-align:top"|Group F winner {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !style="width:175px"|Team !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| |- style="background:#cfc" |align=left| WAPDA |2||2||0||0||4||0||+4||6 |- |align=left| Sui Southern Gas |2||1||0||1||2||2||0||3 |- |align=left| Karachi United |2||0||0||2||1||5||−4||0 |} |style="background:#c1e0ff"|Final standings |colspan="2" style="text-align:center;vertical-align:top"|Group C winner {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !style="width:175px"|Team !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| |- style="background:#cfc" |align=left| Pakistan Air Force |2||1||1||0||4||2||+2||4 |- |align=left|State Life |2||1||0||1||2||3||–1||3 |- |align=left| Pakistan Police |2||0||1||1||3||4||−1||1 |} |- style="vertical-align:top;background:#c1e0ff" |Opponent |Result |Knockout stage |Opponent |Result |- |Pakistan Navy |2–0 |style="background:#c1e0ff"|Quarter-finals |Pakistan Army |0–0 (aet) (2–4 p.) |- |Pakistan Petroleum |2–0 |style="background:#c1e0ff"|Semi-finals |Civil Aviation Authority |1–1 (aet) (4–3 p.) |} ==Match== ===Details=== {| width=92% |- | | |} {| style="width:100%" |style="vertical-align:top;
